entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as someone who can grow plants to a high height in a short amount of time.

entities.name: quidditch field
entities.description: The quidditch field is mentioned as something that will be returned to normal after the task is over.

entities.name: maze
entities.description: A maze is being created for the third task of the Triwizard Tournament.

entities.name: triwizard cup
entities.description: The Triwizard Cup will be placed in the center of the maze and the first champion to touch it will receive full marks.

entities.name: kumar
entities.description: Krum is mentioned as one of the champions who guesses that the task is a maze.

entities.name: bagman
entities.description: Bagman is mentioned as someone who explains the rules of the third task to the champions.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is mentioned as one of the champions who asks a question about the task.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who has an unhappy expression on his face when Hagrid explains that the quidditch field will be returned to normal after the task is over.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric is mentioned as someone who has an unhappy expression on his face when Hagrid explains that the quidditch field will be returned to normal after the task is over.

relationships.description: Hagrid says that the quidditch field will be returned to normal after the task is over.
Bagman explains that a maze is being created for the third task of the Triwizard Tournament.
The Triwizard Cup will be placed in the center of the maze.
Krum guesses that the task is a maze.
Fleur asks a question about the task to Bagman.
Harry has an unhappy expression on his face when Hagrid explains that the quidditch field will be returned to normal after the task is over.
Cedric has an unhappy expression on his face when Hagrid explains that the quidditch field will be returned to normal after the task is over.
